item.description:
Stoddard's Neck Park
Lincoln St (rte. 3A) Hingham, MA
93 South
@ Braintree Split, Stay Left for Rte. 3 South towards Cape Cod
Take immediate exit #18 for Washington St. Quincy Center / T-Station
Keep left, follow signs for Quincy Center, Burgin Parkway
Follow Burgin Parkway 1.7 mi
Take right onto Granite St
First set of lights turn left onto Hancock st
You will then enter Quincy Center rotary (temple St)
Take first right out of rotary onto Washington St
Follow Washington St 1.6 mi
Continue over Fore River Bridge
Washington st. becomes Bridge St (rte. 3A south)
Follow Bridge st. 2.3mi over Weymouth/Hingham Bridge
Bridge St. becomes Lincoln St.
Stoddards Neck is on left directly after Weymouth/Hingham Bridge
Road is divided, proceed past park and make u-turn at next set of lights
(Note u-turn is illegal at lights, turn left into parking lot and turn right back onto Lincoln St / rte. 3a north)

Thanks,
Tiffany, Charles and Parson

group.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group

item.name: JRT JUNE MEETUP
